#### Brandon Sanderson

When asked about Randâ€™s new sword, Brandon acknowledged that most people assume it is Artur Hawkwing's and that Rand had last seen it at Falme in
*The Great Hunt*
. Brandon did not outright declare this to be true, but he did agree that the logic makes sense.
